text: Nan namakar aghuiba, kɨ faragh ingangarir God ua bar e inizir kamɨn, akɨnafarim osirigha ia mɨkɨmasa bar ifonge. Ezɨ kɨ datɨrɨghɨn kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, kɨ akɨnafarir igharazim osiram. Ia uan nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba bagh bar gavgafigh. Egh ia Godɨn akar aghuimɨn apanibar akaba batogh. E Godɨn gumazamiziba, a nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn arazir vamɨram e ganɨngi. Eghtɨ gumazitam en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim batueghɨva, akar igiatam atɨghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ.
